TEXT.S: Ashraf Amaya sraral hya'ga sisyuw na NBA, wal malaxmisuq qaniy la. kawas tay 1971, ryax sa tay 23 nqu tay 11, Ashraf Amaya, biru na p'unro. qyanux nya pqwasan biru Ashraf Amaya mqwas biru beh Oak Park and River Forest High School.suruw lga musa beh Walther Lutheran gocyu pqwasan biru. Ashraf Amaya mzyu mari maki Southern Illinois hopa pqwasan biru.
